Incredible story, very fun gameplay and an amazing vibrant city. If you've ever played Bioshock before, I highly recommend this game as well as the season pass. If you've never played a Bioshock game before, this game will still make sense, however the DLC's may not. I would recommend holding off on playing the season pass until you play the first Bioshock. A summary is available for the game but playing through the first game would make the DLC's better than just listening to a summary of the events. Onto the main game, I love pretty much everything about it, the gameplay is just as fun as the previous 2 Bioshocks and the settings in my opinion is 10x better than Rapture. I won't say that much about the story as it's something you should experience for yourself but I will say that it's an incredible and intricate story that will blow your mind.

Bioshock Infinite reminds of Resident Evil 5 and Fallout 4 in the sense that it's not a Bioshock game in spirit but only in name. Now don't get me wrong it's a damn fun FPS and I enjoyed my time with campaign. I thought the Vigors were more fun to use then Plasmids and the city of Colombia is on par with Rapture in my opinion. I'd say I got my moneys worth and would recommend this to any lover of the FPS genre

quality game, definitely recommend, amazing story line.

(10/10) Esse jogo é um grande exemplo de que uma obra prima completa pode existir, personagens incriveis, historia marcante, gameplay extremamente divertida e mundo super interessante e bem desenvolvido. Conhecemos esse universo controlando Booker DeWitt na companhia da incrível Elizabeth (MELHOR COMPANHEIRA DOS GAMES), exploramos a grande Columbia, um dos melhores planos de fundo pra um jogo, uma cidade aparentemente perfeita mais que se revela o cumulo da podridão humana, onde a desigualdade é explicita, o racismo é praticado sem punição alguma e o fanatismo religioso é intrínseco na população, onde um aproveitador e vilão da historia Zachary Comstock, se aproveita da fé cega para se denominar profeta. Com um dos melhores enredos se não o melhor da historia dos videogames, Bioshock infinite te recompensa com uma grande experiência digna da serie Bioshock, com direito a um grande plot twist na história, que te fará pensar e jogar novamente para uma compreensão total, difícilmente vocé vai esquecer esse universo. "UMA OBRA PRIMA COMPLETA E DELICIOSA DE EXPERIÊNCIAR" 10/10 - Meu jogo favorito da vida!

Y que esperar de este Bioshock, simplemente espectacular! Historia excepcional, mecánicas un poco diferentes a los anteriores títulos, pero siempre con esa escencia que caractariza a esta saga de juegos, recomendadísimo aun así si no jugaste a los dos anteriores.

n ye bas yönünü gör git ->  düşmanları öldür -> n ye bas yönünü gör git. oyun bundan itirabaren arkadaşlar. oynanışda çeşitlilik çok az. 8 tane skilliniz var fakat bu skillerde çok yetersiz. skilleri 1 2 kere kullandıktan sonra skill seçmeye başlamadan elinize ne varsa onunla dümdüz oynamaya devam ediyorsunuz. benim görüşüm sıkıcı sığ bir oyun. çok büyük beklentiler ile aldım hayal kırıklığına uğradım

Linear game but interesting in its own way. I like it's story more than the mechanical changes from bioshock 1/2. Abilities are much more impactful and yet I can't help feel like there's something missing. One of the more interesting things about the game is how much the feeling of it changes as you progress. Bioshock starts with jumping you into a world feeling of insanity and darkness. where as infinite feels more like you are the driving force behind the chaos and insanity. I love this game for what it is. It took me a while to bother to play it due to its initial feeling not immediately feeling like the same old bioshock game I expected.

ahhh que recuerdos me dio volver a jugarlo déspues de unos 4 años y ahora darme cuenta de tantos detalles que se me pasaron de largo desde las increible banda sonora, la jugabilidad que en mi caso me re encanta, y la historia que igual en los dlc y final se una con rapture; asi que 10/10

I see a lot of critisism and it is well deserved, doesn't come close to the original bioshock and the ending can seem very annoying, like they were trying to do a bioshock 1 ending. still I found enjoyment and if you haven't played it don't sell it too short.

Truly a masterpiece!! Provides the perfect conclusion to a perfect trilogy. From the improved gameplay and a story that has you hooked until the credits roll, infinite wraps up one of the best gaming experiences ive ever had. The ending has me shook even weeks after i finished it and i dont think ill ever experience an ending like that in gaming for a long time. Infinite delivers on all fronts and i give it my highest recommendation possible! 11/10

Ich bin mit BioShock Infintite in die BioShock-Reihe eingestiegen und habe mir dann im Nachgang auch gleich die ersten beiden Spiele geholt. Besonders angetan haben es mir die Story und die Charaktere von Infinite, die mich mit Blick auf die Wendungen und das Ende überzeugen konnten. Hinsichtlich der Story eines der besten Spiele, die ich bisher gespielt habe.
Im Gegensatz zu den ersten beiden Teilen spielt Infinite allerdings nicht unter Wasser, sondern in den Wolken der Stadt Columbia. Als Booker DeWitt erhalten wir den Auftrag eine Person Namens Elizabeth zu retten, was sich allerdings leichter anhört, als es letzten Endes ist. Über die Story hinweg erfahren wir mehr über Elizabeth und Booker und schlussendlich auch, was es mit ihrer Rettung auf sich hat. Das ein oder andere Fragezeichen bleibt allerdings auch noch nach dem ersten Durchlauf bestehen, was in meinen Augen den Wiederspielwert noch einmal steigert. Gleiches gilt für die beiden Dlcs, die mir ebenfalls sehr gut gefallen haben und uns in das Setting der ersten beiden Teile entführen.

Der gewählte "Grafikstil" gefällt mir ebenfalls sehr gut und steht ein Stück weit im Widerspruch zu dem von Rassismus, Religiösen Fanatismus und Ausbeutung geprägten Setting der Stadt Columbia. 

Das Kampfsystem bietet Dank dem Zugriff auf die Fähigkeiten von Booker und Elizabeth (sofern sie euch gerade begleitet) eine gute Abwechslung zu den vorhandenen Waffen und ergänzt das Ganze noch einmal.

Einziger Kritikpunkt ist die fehlende Möglichkeit selbständig zu speichern.

Alles in allem kann ich das Spiel mit Blick auf die gelungene Story und die Charaktere allerdings nur empfehlen.

本作的剧情属于细嚼慢咽型的，算上两个海葬DLC，一周目通关你只能理解50%的剧情，剧情主干和中心思想都能看懂，但会有很多疑问，为什么为什么为什么？？？二周目通关你能弄清75%的剧情，很多问题在游戏中其实给出了答案，就看你够不够细致去发现、推理、联系等等，但还是有很多“BUG”解释不了；想要弄清全部100%的剧情及其中的细节，只有进行了3周目以上的大神（化学家）才能解析的透彻，而我，选择学习大神的剧情分析文章（实在是水平有限弄不明白，又太想知道了）。在此感谢生化奇兵贴吧大神@夜城共青团，的分析贴

over-rated crap, maybe you'll enjoy it if you're still a teenager. It's like hollywood made a game; pretentious 2deep4u story with racial antagonizing, bastardization of religious themes, and forgettable, shallow characters. Even the environments are copy-pasted all over.

It's only saving grace is the combat, which even then is nothing special given our modern industry. Finished in 7 hours and glad I'm past it. terrible terrible terrible, doesn't deserve the amount of positive reviews it has.
